rules_text:
This artifact enters tapped. When it does, tap target creature you don't control and put a stun counter on it.
{T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast noncreature spells.
Warp 1{WU} [i](You may cast this card from your hand for its warp cost. Exile this artifact at the beginning of the next end step, then you may cast it from exile on a later turn.)[/i]
